result.reason: When 'Send To Screen' floats the panel, InterfaceControl resizes but no resize/reconnect is triggered on the active RDP session, leaving the remote desktop at the original smaller size.
result.approach: After SendPanelToScreen() repositions the floating panel, enumerate active RDP connections in that panel and call DoResizeClient() (or UpdateSessionDisplaySettings()) so the RDP viewport adjusts to the new panel bounds.
